text: Question 1.20 The number such that (1 + &) = fi(1) on the IEEE floating system is approximately twice the rounding unit. To find & we could start from a random number (not too large) and keep dividing it by two and seeing what adding it to 1 gives. At some point it will be so small that adding it to 1 will just give 1. That number would be between 7 and 2n for that calculator.
